title: Iviewus.com Highlights the Issues on the Most Common Flaws of Cheap Cloned Android Gadgets Based on User Experience
text:
People all over the world go crazy over the latest mobile devices like the smartphones and android tablets. Well, who won’t be amazed at what these gadgets can do? They simply make communication and access to information much easier. Android tablets make it’s users feel as if they have the world in a compact mobile gadget that everything they could ever need is right in the palm of their hands.
With any affordable android tablet , watching movies, transacting with a bank, shopping, doing research and communicating with people from across the globe would be as simple as ABC, of course with the help of a very strong internet signal. It’s amazing what these compact and handheld gadgets have done to change how mankind lives; it has absolutely revolutionized not only all the various industries, but it has made a great impact globally.
However, although it may seem that these affordable android tablets are truly technologically advanced that it can do almost anything, there are still a lot of flaws that some people discover and complain about especially with the cheap cloned android tablets being sold in the market nowadays. People take advantage of these cloned mobile devices thinking that they are just being practical as to how they spend their hard-earned money. On the other hand, what they don’t realize is that there are risks in buying these cloned cheap android tablet models.
Here are some of the documented flaws on these mobile gadgets:
· One of the main concerns of most android users is the gadget’s security features . With the unearthing of the cloned versions of popular brands of mobile phones, how sure are the consumers that they are protected from the dangers of its hidden security flaws. Consumers and android tablet users have to understand that these mobile units may look and feel the same, but it doesn’t run the same security features as those superior brands. And worse, they may be victimized by fraudulent people if the owners lost their phones.
· Another issue of concern by most users of these cheap gadgets is that there are a lot of applications that could not be installed and run on them. This is basically attributed to the fact that these cloned gadgets are not designed with the same efficient operating software like the branded original ones. These cheap android tablets experience a lot of errors and application crashes which makes it useless when using other high-end applications.
· One of the most common dilemmas that cheap android users experience is the inadequate internal storage which makes the gadget’s functions slow down. They may be designed with an SD card slot, but there are instances when applications could not be directly installed in the memory cards and still consume a lot of space in the tablet’s internal memory which makes it more congested.
